text: Kamou Malo (born 1963) is a former Burkinabé footballer, who is currently manager of Burkina Faso. ==Playing career== During his playing career, Malo played for Ouagadougou-based clubs US Ouagadougou and Étoile Filante. ==Managerial career== In 2010, after managing Majestic, Malo was appointed manager of RC Kadiogo. After a three-year period, Malo joined AS SONABEL. In 2015, Malo returned to Kadiogo. During his second spell at the club, Malo helped Kadiogo to win two Burkinabé Premier League's, in 2016 and 2017. In 2018, Malo joined USFA, finishing second in the league. In July 2019, Malo was appointed manager of Burkina Faso. ==Personal life== Malo's son, Patrick, is a current Burkina Faso international. ==Honours== RC Kadiogo *Burkinabé Premier League: 2015–16, 2016–17 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkinabé football managers Category:Burkina Faso national football team managers Category:1963 births Category:US Ouagadougou players Category:Étoile Filante de Ouagadougou players
title: Kamou Malo
